about_the_game:
✦ A Story in the Stars ✦

Play as ???, a mysterious character who wakes to an unfamiliar world with too many questions, and not enough answers. Meet the residents of the Orrery, uncover their stories, and figure out what ???'s got to do with any of it.

✦ Features ✦

Interactive Storytelling!

Every room is a recreation of a mythology, which means every room has a unique mechanic that relates to their story in some shape or form. Work your way through each one and learn a little more about the story of the stars alongside our hero!

Mystery!

Learn the story behind our strange hero, whose very identity seems to be shrouded in unknowns. Why does it seem like everyone else seem to know exactly who they are, and who is that really who they're meant to be?

Mythology!

Lovingly crafted re-imaginings of classic Greek protagonists and creatures that are scattered amongst the stars of western horoscopes. Catch glimpses of interactions between them, and have your own little conversations with them as well.

From Made with Cookies to you, we hope you enjoy our game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: N/A

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent

short_description: Ecliptic is a 3D Puzzle Adventure Game set in the Stars! Inspired by the mythological figures of the horoscope, embark on the hero's journey with the mysterious protagonist on a journey of identity and discovery.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
